mapper.sql: RESOURCE_ID, NAME, URL, TYPE, DESCRIPTION, NODE_ORDER, PID, IS_ENABLED, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR
mapper.insert: insert into system_resource (RESOURCE_ID, NAME, URL, TYPE, DESCRIPTION, NODE_ORDER, PID, IS_ENABLED, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATOR) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update system_resource
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NODE_ORDER = #{nodeOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ENABLED = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATOR = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
